sn35.236:4.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ sati cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe …
sn35.236:4.6: jivhāya sati jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe …
sn35.236:4.7: manasmiṃ sati manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe ….
sn35.236:5.1: Hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati ādānanikkhepanaṃ na paññāyati;
sn35.236:5.4: kucchismiṃ asati jighacchā pipāsā na paññāyati.
sn35.236:5.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ asati cakkhusamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe …
sn35.236:5.7: manasmiṃ asati manosamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhan”ti.
